Vocabulary.mean: to get to or reach some place.

Vocabulary.mean: a second or a very short time.

Vocabulary.mean: happy or satisfied.

Vocabulary.mean: to give an answer or say back to someone.

Vocabulary.mean: something you do to fool another person.

Vocabulary.mean: use to say that something was done in a good way.

Vocabulary.mean: with great attention, especially to detail or safety.

Vocabulary.mean: to make something new.

Vocabulary.mean: morally bad, cruel, or very unpleasant.
